title: Costa Rica
summary: Established in 1968, Citi Costa Rica is recognized for its Foreign Exchange expertise, Corporate and Institutional Internet services, and prides itself on being the only bank in the market to provide clients with Global Wealth Management service with local advice. Since 2008, Citi Costa Rica has established a Shared Service Center in the country and positioned itself as a leader in corporate banking.
tag-2: For more than 54 years, Citi has enabled economic growth in Costa Rica
